unnormalised: Brace yourselves, Bollywood buffs! This week's releases are wilder than a Shah Rukh Khan dance-off in a Delhi wedding. First up, "Dulhania Runs Amok," a rom-com promising more chaos than a Mumbai local at 8 PM. Critics are saying it's either brilliant or brain-melting. No in-between!
normalised: brace yourselves, Bollywood buffs! this week's releases are wilder than a Shah Rukh Khan dance-off in a Delhi wedding. first up, "Dulhania Runs Amok," a rom-com promising more chaos than a Mumbai local at eight P M. critics are saying it's either brilliant or brain-melting. no in-between!

unnormalised: Then there's "Inspector Sharma and the Case of the Missing Samosas," a crime thriller so gripping, you'll forget to order that extra plate of paneer tikka. Early reviews hint at a twist so shocking, it involves a rogue caterer and Rs. 50,000 worth of pilfered pastry.
normalised: then there's "inspector Sharma and the Case of the Missing Samosas," a crime thriller so gripping, you'll forget to order that extra plate of paneer tikka. early reviews hint at a twist so shocking, it involves a rogue caterer and rupee fifty thousand worth of pilfered pastry.

unnormalised: Meanwhile, the historical epic "Rani Lakshmi Bai's Badminton Battles" (yes, you read that right) hits cinemas on 26/01/2024. Apparently, she wasn't just good with a sword. Expect badminton action, historical inaccuracies, and a questionable plot twist involving a time-traveling shuttlecock.
normalised: meanwhile, the historical epic "Rani Lakshmi Bai's Badminton Battles" (yes, you read that right) hits cinemas on twenty sixth january two thousand and twenty four. apparently, she wasn't just good with a sword. expect badminton action, historical inaccuracies, and a questionable plot twist involving a time-traveling shuttlecock.

unnormalised: Trade analysts are predicting a mixed bag. Will these films rake in the crores? Will they bomb harder than a Diwali firecracker gone wrong? Tune in next week at 15:00 hrs on 1/1/2025 for the box office verdict. And remember, folks, always bring extra popcorn! The drama unfolds both on and off screen, starting 14/07/2024.
